samples.heading: State Farm Agent Services Dashboards
samples.project: Part of the MySFDomain restructure launched under the guidance of one Don Spaulding
samples.tools: Material UI, React JS, d3 JS, HighCharts JS, Foundation SASS (slides 2-3)

thumb.title: Material UI Dashboard
thumb.desc: Highcharts.js used for charting in conjuction with React component lifecycles

lightbox.title: Foundation UI Framework Dashboard
lightbox.desc: Zurb's Foundation framework in use alongside a darker palette and different typography stack

samples.heading: MICU Loan Application Mockups
samples.project: Mockups for an inviting, responsive new loan application with Midwest Illinois Credit Union (MICU).

thumb.title: MICU Responsive Loan Application Hub
thumb.desc: The first screen post login serves as a navigational and informational hub. Sporting MICU brand colors, Optima typeface and assisted with other sandy earth tones. The navigation is terse and clearly separated from important pre-requisite information.

lightbox.title: MICU Gesture Indication
lightbox.desc: Gesture indication reveals how users will interact with the interface to display additional information from twirl-downs.

lightbox.title: MICU Personal Information Step
lightbox.desc: SSL information is in the header to remind applicants their sensitive information is secure. This slide is an example of the responsive nature of the app as it is being planned.

samples.heading: LeaseRates.com Landing Page Mockups
samples.project: Prototypes for landing pages from Google paid advertising search results.

samples.heading: Knockout & Foundation Demo
samples.project: Workplace Incident Reporting App working prototype built for the Multiple Cause Incident Analysis database of Hile Group. The project was cancelled before being implemented as a working solution.

samples.heading: Data Visualization Demo
samples.project: A quick demonstration of dynamic visualization of data, scraping the surface of the capabilities of D3.js

samples.heading: Citizen's Equity First Credit Union (CEFCU)
samples.project: Compilation of samples of static and interactive extranet promotions for credit and loan promotions
samples.tools: Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Dreamweaver, Adobe Illustrator, jQuery

thumb.title: Don't Tax My Credit Union Promotion
thumb.desc: Sketched using online services, mocked up in Photoshop with assets created in Illustrator, built in Dreamweaver and tested in a development environment.

lightbox.title: Platinum Credit Card Promotion
lightbox.desc: Static HTML page with interactive Javascript element below the fold.

lightbox.title: Expanded Customer Interaction Portal
lightbox.desc: A short, single page application collecting data about credit card use and suggesting a product to customer based on that data.

samples.heading: Baitmaker
samples.project: E-commerce site with pure native Javascript product customization module
samples.tools: PHP, Paypal API, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Dreamweaver, Adobe Illustrator

thumb.title: Baitmaker Home Page
thumb.desc: This colorful interactive site was ahead of it's time in offering fully customizable tackle in over 64,000 combinations

lightbox.title: Interactive Customization Module
lightbox.desc: Javascript replaces alpha transparent PNGs on separate z-index layers to preview fully customized products

lightbox.title: Baitmaker Contact Page
lightbox.desc: A simple PHP script allows customers to send emails to the owner directly from the site.
